title: To The Foe My Word Is Always "No"
author: Margaret E. Barber (1869-1930) bio; Adapted by Watchman Nee (1903-1972)

v1: To the foe my word is always, "No,"
That His plan and all His counsel
Through the Spirit's pow'r in me.
v2: To the foe my word is always, "No,"
May the Lord protect and bless,
When I'm list'ning to Thine orders,
Grant me mercy, Lord, I pray.
v3: To the foe my word is always, "No,"
If the Lord will save and keep me,
As I forward press with Him,
Then no trials shall prevent me,
